original_title: Kandy District final results released as NPP wins 9 seats
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Kandy District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 64% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 500,596 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 145,939 votes (18.83%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 9 seats in the district while the SJB has won 2 seats and the NDF secured one seat in the district.
